Thanks for your prompt reply gupta. How is it being done for the integration
testing in JUnit ? Is there any references i can refer to ?

I have gone through the "Programmer Love Writing Tests" but it only interact
with only one class ! My worry how can i ensure that my updated class is working
fine when it put into production machine ? It would be better if any framework
that allows me to trace the intergration if any !

thanks,
selena


sachin gupta wrote:

> Hello ,
>
> Yu can use JUnit for integration testing as well. All you need to do is to
> consider the integrated systems as a unit and call the interface or
> interacting methods to check their functionality.
>
> Is there any particular functionality you are looking for in the Integration
> Testing Framework ?
>
> Regards,
>
> Sachin
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: selena su [mailto:selena.su@...]

>      Is there any Integration framework for JAVA available in the industry ?
>
